title: Color Pixel Art Classic
description: Color Pixel Art Classic is a cool pixel-based casual art drawing game where precision and creativity meet. Choose from a wide selection of images to fill them in to become colorful masterpieces! Select the right hues, and aim to recreate each image with perfect accuracy. Whether you're working on a beginner-friendly design with just a few colors or tackling a more advanced piece with a wide range of shades, Color Pixel Art Classic is a perfect way to hone in on your digital art skills, perfect for all levels.
